issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: HBase-Hive (managed) table creation fails with strict managed table checks: Table is marked as a managed table but is not transactional

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Similar to HIVE-20085 and HIVE-20111. Accumulo-Hive (managed) table creation fails with strict managed table checks: Table is marked as a managed table but is not transactional
